description: Manage the library of the cluster.

commands.name: az hdinsight-on-aks cluster library list
commands.summary: List all libraries of HDInsight on AKS cluster.
commands.syntax:
az hdinsight-on-aks cluster library list --category {custom, predefined}
                                         --cluster-name
                                         --cluster-pool-name
                                         --resource-group
                                         [--max-items]
                                         [--next-token]
examples: az hdinsight-on-aks cluster library list --cluster-name {clustername} -g {resourcesGroup} --cluster-pool-name {clusterpoolname} --debug --category custom
az hdinsight-on-aks cluster library list --cluster-name {clustername} -g {resourcesGroup} --cluster-pool-name {clusterpoolname} --debug --category predefined

commands.name: az hdinsight-on-aks cluster library manage
commands.summary: Library management operations on HDInsight on AKS cluster.
commands.syntax:
az hdinsight-on-aks cluster library manage --action {Install, Uninstall}
                                           --libraries
                                           [--cluster-name]
                                           [--cluster-pool-name]
                                           [--ids]
                                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                           [--resource-group]
                                           [--subscription]
examples: az hdinsight-on-aks cluster library manage --cluster-name {clustername} -g {resourcesGroup} --cluster-pool-name {clusterpoolname} --action install --libraries '[{maven:{group-id:com.azure.resourcemanager,name:azure-resourcemanager-hdinsight-containers,version:1.0.0-beta.2}}]'

az hdinsight-on-aks cluster library manage --cluster-name {clustername} -g {resourcesGroup} --cluster-pool-name {clusterpoolname} --action uninstall --libraries '[{maven:{group-id:com.azure.resourcemanager,name:azure-resourcemanager-hdinsight-containers,version:1.0.0-beta.2}}]'
az hdinsight-on-aks cluster library manage --cluster-name {clustername} -g {resourcesGroup} --cluster-pool-name {clusterpoolname} --action install --libraries '[{pypi:{name:pandas}}]'
